channel.title: Please help
channel.description:
I've downloaded several different sources because I'm trying to make a cool server but, when I try to compile them, it gives me the stupid "javac is not recognized" message everytime. I've downloaded a few different java updates and it still doesn't seem to work. Please help.
[b]I have tried to "Do Not Ask" Post and that didnt work![/b]

item.title: Please help
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

Install it and then try again, the javac program is in that thing.

Read full topic

item.title: Please help
item.dc:creator: @MastrChief MastrChief
item.description:
@MastrChief wrote:

Shall i list each 1 or just one of them[br][size=1]Posted on: February 05, 2007, 04:57:08 PM[/size][hr]shadow scape:

@echo off COLOR f0 set pro=%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0 set pro2=%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0 set jac=\bin\javac.exe if exist "C:\Program Files (x86)\" set programfiles="C:\Program Files (x86) cls :c cls title Compiler goto cjc :c2 javac *.java echo. echo. pause exit :cjc if exist "%pro%_06%jac%" (goto sjc) else (goto cjc2) :cjc2 if exist "%pro%_07%jac%" (goto sjc2) else (goto cjc3) :cjc3 if exist "%pro%_08%jac%" (goto sjc3) else (goto cjc4) :cjc4 if exist "%pro%_09%jac%" (goto sjc4) else (goto cjc5) :cjc5 if exist "%pro%_10%jac%" (goto sjc5) else (goto cjc6) :cjc6 if exist "%pro2%%jac%" (goto sjc6) else (goto cjc7) :cjc7 if exist "%pro%%jac%" (goto sjc7) else (goto cjc8) :cjc8 if exist "%pro%_01%jac%" (goto sjc8) else (goto cjc9) :cjc9 if exist "%pro%_02%jac%" (goto sjc9) else (goto cjc10) :cjc10 if exist "%pro%_03%jac%" (goto sjc10) else (goto cjc11) :cjc11 if exist "%pro%_04%jac%" (goto sjc11) else (goto cjc12) :cjc12 if exist "%pro%_05%jac%" (goto sjc12) else (goto je) :sjc set javac="%pro%_06%jac%" goto c2 :sjc2 set javac="%pro%_07%jac%" goto c2 :sjc3 set javac="%pro%_08%jac%" goto c2 :sjc4 set javac="%pro%_09%jac%" goto c2 :sjc5 set javac="%pro%_10%jac%" goto c2 :sjc6 set javac="%pro2%%jac%" goto c2 :sjc7 set javac="%pro%%jac%" goto c2 :sjc8 set javac="%pro%_01%jac%" goto c2 :sjc9 set javac="%pro%_02%jac%" goto c2 :sjc10 set javac="%pro%_03%jac%" goto c2 :sjc11 set javac="%pro%_04%jac%" goto c2 :sjc12 set javac="%pro%_05%jac%" goto c2 :cl cls goto c5 :je echo You don't have Java installed on this computer echo Get it pause

Zamorak Server:

@echo off javac *.java pause

Fearscape:

@echo off title fearscape Compiler javac *.java pause[br][size=1]Posted on: February 05, 2007, 05:01:11 PM[/size][hr]Help please??[br][size=1]Posted on: February 05, 2007, 05:05:37 PM[/size][hr]ffs will somebody PLEASE help me?[br][size=1]Posted on: February 05, 2007, 05:16:16 PM[/size][hr]This REALLY sucks… Can someone PLEASE help me…[br][size=1]Posted on: February 05, 2007, 05:50:22 PM[/size][hr]…[br][size=1]Posted on: February 05, 2007, 06:28:06 PM[/size][hr]so will anyone help me yet?
